articles.title: Motherson Sumi ‘on the verge’ of announcing multiple buyouts - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Buyouts are a part of the company’s vision of tripling revenues by FY25 to $36 billion from $12 billion under the Vision 2025 plan. Since 2002, Motherson Sumi Systems has made 24 acquisitions in the automotive and non-automotive segments.
articles.content:
Motherson Sumi, Indias biggest auto-component manufacturer, is pursuing multiple buyout deals, some of which will be made public in the final quarter of the year, top company officials said.
